mapper.select: SELECT t.`id` as id, t.`name` as name, t.`employee_id` as employee_id, d.`dname` as deptno, p.`dname` as postno, t.`phoneno` as phone , t.`email` as email, t.`join_date` as join_date, t.`staff_type` as staff_type, t.`staff_status` as staff_status, t.`gmt_create` as gmt_create FROM `information` t LEFT JOIN `dept` d on t.`deptno` = d.`id` LEFT JOIN `post` p on t.`postno` = p.`id` ${ew.customSqlSegment} LIMIT #{current},#{limit}
